name: BlockColor Game
description:
Hello Everyone,

 I have create a setup for easy installation for Windows, this create a shortcut in desktop and you can easy install/remove my Game. I use Minetest Engine 0.4.17. This is not a minecraft and this is not Minetest Game, my idea is create a game with vehicules, trees, decorations, animals, clothes. My Idea is create a fun game, this is not perfect and not finish. The creative is for start, i think add a survival in futur. You can create planet map earth, i think add moon and mars.

You can now install easy this Game for Windows, i have create a setup for this. This Game use Minetest Engine 0.4.17. You can use so in minetest with the SubGame in CDB Minetest. This is not ready for Minetest Engine 5.0. I search people for test this and you can communicate in this discord : Discord.gg.

SubGame for Minetest 0.4.16/17 : https://content.minetest.net/packages/Chiantos/blockcolor/

You can use actually in this Game :

- Decorations

- Vehicules

- Animals

- Clothes

- Nodes

- Trees

What is the idea for this Game ? I like Garry Mod and i Like Minecraft, my idea is create a game, where people can play rp / survival / creative. i have start devellop this in tablet android, now i use pc (Yes, this is not a joke). My idea is create so a cross platform Game (Android, Linux, Windows ... mayble Apple).

This is not perfect, else you are interest, i open for people suggestion, help and others.
